> For docker deployment exposed port is 8090 instead of mentioned 8080.
>
> Change in README or in deploy_explorer.sh is needed.
>

> external port is the same and it's the one used in documentation.

changes

Create a LFID, if you do not have one: https://identity.linuxfoundation.org

gerrit: https://gerrit.hyperledger.org

jira:
https://jira.hyperledger.org/secure/RapidBoard.jspa?rapidView=155&projectKey=BE

On Wed, Nov 21, 2018 at 1:24 PM Mathilde Ffrench <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

> ... by using Postgre entrypoint feature as described here :
> https://hub.docker.com/_/postgres/ (https://hub.docker.com/_/postgres/)
>
> Then I'm able to run Hyperledger Explorer as follow :
>
> version: '2.1'
>
> networks:
>   mynetwork.com:
>     name: mynetwork.com
>
> services:
>
>   explorerdb.mynetwork.com:
>     image: mffrench/explorer-db:0.3.5.1
>     container_name: explorerdb.mynetwork.com
>     hostname: explorerdb.mynetwork.com
>     environment:
>       - DATABASE_DATABASE=fabricexplorer
>       - DATABASE_USERNAME=hppoc
>       - DATABASE_PASSWORD=password
>     command: bash -c "cp /opt/createdb.sh /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d && /docker-entrypoint.sh postgres"
>     networks:
>       - mynetwork.com
>
>   explorer.mynetwork.com:
>     image: mffrench/explorer:0.3.5.1
>     container_name: explorer.mynetwork.com
>     hostname: explorer.mynetwork.com
>     environment:
>       - DATABASE_HOST=explorerdb.mynetwork.com
>       - DATABASE_USERNAME=hppoc
>       - DATABASE_PASSWD=password
>     volumes:
>       - ./explorer-config/config.json:/opt/explorer/app/platform/fabric/config.json
>       - ./crypto-config:/tmp/crypto
>     command: sh -c "sleep 16 && node /opt/explorer/main.js && tail -f /dev/null"
>     ports:
>       - 8090:8080
>     networks:
>      - mynetwork.com
>
> ------------------------------
> You can view, comment on, or merge this pull request online at:
>
>   https://github.com/hyperledger/blockchain-explorer/pull/21
> Commit Summary
>
>    - enable db conf for simplified docker-compose
>    - remove faulty sql
>
> File Changes
>
>    - *M* app/persistence/postgreSQL/db/createdb.sh
>    <https://github.com/hyperledger/blockchain-explorer/pull/21/files#diff-0>
>    (74)
>    - *M* app/persistence/postgreSQL/db/explorerpg.sql
>    <https://github.com/hyperledger/blockchain-explorer/pull/21/files#diff-1>
>    (2)
>
> Patch Links:
>
>    - https://github.com/hyperledger/blockchain-explorer/pull/21.patch
>    - https://github.com/hyperledger/blockchain-explorer/pull/21.diff
>
> —
